text: I think the closest we'll ever have to Dark Cloud 3 is Ni No Kuni (Level 5, PS3 exclusive).  I'm not comparing gameplay style or story or characters.  Simply the development team and color/ambience/general atmosphere.
author: David List

text: I'm pretty sure there are at least 2. in fact I'm sure there are at LEAST 2. ah, number 88 and 365. altho i could have SWORN i'd heard the queens song.
author: Justinian

text:
last night i had a dream where i saw a commercial for dark cloud 3. i was jumping up and down in sheer joy. the main character was oddly, ringo. djangos father from the boktai games. it was set in the past before max and monica had their adventure, and at the end it pissed me off by announcing that it would come out on the playstation vita and not a home console.

that dream made me realize how much i fucking want dark cloud 3....
author: solar464

text: Shit, I never got to him in Dark Chronicle, Zelmite Mines kicked my arse.

text: why is everyone such a fan of spheda I hated it personally because it was so god dang hard but I loved the rest of the game
author: altispinex86

text: I literally have only one complaint about the game. The Dark Genie boss fight. I will admit that I suck, but damn that was hard. The absolutely FLAWLESS music makes up for any flaws this game could have had though.
author: ChronoDA

text: True, but Halo is an FPS whilst not comparable, but I totally agree, Dark Chronicle has an amazing replay value and so much to do, and the plus about it is that it is cel-shaded graphics and so cozy at the same time.
author: Nation of Masturbation

text: I can't even begin to describe how many lucky "bounce-off-wall-change-color-distortion-closed" shots I had playing that....maybe that's why I was so fond of that mini-game, I won a lot on last chance shots like that haha

author: pauche

text: I like how you throw in music from some of the lesser remembered vidja games. Hell I forgot this game exsisted till I saw the title. Played the first one but couldn't get my grubby mitts on the second. Addictive.
author: Kael Rus

text: @shadowg3 the random dungeon generator didn't bother me what did though were the seals.  If the blue seal came up it was no problem cause my Max was stronger but if it was the red one the dungeons got really tough cause while Monica was my fav of the two just wasn't strong and I had to play keep away with magic which made them longer.  The white seal wasn't too bad.

text: This song is my second most favorite song in all of Dark Cloud 2. The music that they do in this game is really good. Sometimes I get on Dark Cloud 2 just to listen to the music.
